headline: Heard on the Street Recap: Casino Capitalism
summary: New sanctions on Russia drove up oil prices.  Brent crude futures surged more than 5%, the biggest jump since June, after the Trump administration hit Russia’s two biggest oil companies with substantial new sanctions over the war in Ukraine.  Stocks jumped on hopes for trade talks.

headline: These Stocks Moved the Most Today: Tesla, IBM, D-Wave Quantum, Dow Inc., Molina Healthcare, Las Vegas Sands, Southwest, and More
summary: Tesla rises and IBM falls after reporting quarterly earnings, while quantum-computing stocks soar on a report the Trump administration is considering taking equity stakes in several companies in exchange for federal funding. The Commerce Department denied the report.

headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Las Vegas Sands Soars; Molina Healthcare Falls as Medical Costs Mount
summary: A casino stock surged on Thursday, Oct. 23, 2025, as its recent investments began to pay off, while a health insurer came under pressure amid rising medical costs.

headline: How major US stock indexes fared Thursday, 10/23/2025
summary: The Nasdaq composite rose 0.9%.  President Donald Trump announced new sanctions on Russia’s crude industry.  Strong earnings reports from several big U.S. companies also lifted the market, including from Dow and Las Vegas Sands.
